snippet: SIEGEL--Bernard. Beloved husband of Sheryl, father of Andy and Ronda, father-in-law of Randi, grandfather to Adam, Emily, Blake, Cooper and Phoebe. Always engaged with family and friends, Bernie was a remarkable man who passed away on March 30th at 89. Genius IQ, 1939 World's Fair french-speaking award winner, and full scholarship graduate University of Wisconsin/Harvard Business School. As founder of Harmony Carpets Bernie was a fashion trend leader in designer contract carpeting. More importantly, no one enjoyed living life to the fullest more than Bernie. He traveled the world, dined in the finest restaurants, was a master storyteller and all will miss his warmth and kindness. 1/3
